meanings.definition: Dental floss: a soft thread used to clean between teeth.
meanings.sent1: Every night, I use floss to clean between my teeth.
meanings.sent2: It is important to use floss daily to maintain good oral hygiene.
meanings.sent3: The floss danced between my teeth, making them feel fresh and clean.
meanings.sent4: Her smile sparkled like the moonlight on a strand of floss.
meanings.sent5: The floss gently removed the food particles stuck between my teeth.

meanings.definition: Floss: to clean between teeth with dental floss.
meanings.sent1: I floss my teeth after brushing every night.
meanings.sent2: Remember to floss regularly to prevent cavities.
meanings.sent3: He flossed his teeth with precision, like a skilled dentist.
meanings.sent4: She flossed away the plaque, revealing a bright smile.
meanings.sent5: Flossing helps to remove plaque and keep your gums healthy.

meanings.definition: Floss: a soft, loosely twisted thread or fabric used for embroidery or decorative purposes.
meanings.sent1: She used colorful floss to create beautiful embroidery designs.
meanings.sent2: The floss added a touch of elegance to the decorative pillow.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous kitten played with the floss, unraveling it across the room.
meanings.sent4: The floss shimmered in the sunlight, enhancing the beauty of the tapestry.
meanings.sent5: The intricate patterns were brought to life with the delicate floss threads.
